    • Method Detail

      • validate

        boolean validate()
        Validates this csar. Caution: This call is expensive

      • getTransformations

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Transformation> getTransformations()
        Returns:
        a map of all transformation objects of this csar. This includes scheduled, ongoing and finished transformations. Key of each map entry is the platform identifier of its particular transformation.

      • getTransformation

        java.util.Optional<Transformation> getTransformation(java.lang.String platformId)
        Parameters:
        platformId - the target platform id which will match the the returned transformation
        Returns:
        the transformation of this csar which match given platform

        the identifier of the CSAR

      • getLog

        Log getLog()
        Returns:
        the log of this csar, which e.g. contains information about parsing

      • getContentDir

        java.io.File getContentDir()
        Returns:
        the root directory of the unzipped csar.
